wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-03-03：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2015-04-17：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 361°商品管理数据库系统 .svn源码泄露 详细说明：  <?phpif(!defined('THINK_PATH')) exit();return $array = array (  'DB_TYPE' => 'mysql',  'DB_HOST' => '123.196.125.42:/var/lib/mysql/mysql.sock',  'DB_NAME' => 'wechat',  'DB_USER' => 'wechat',  'DB_PWD' => 'svh28148asdh120adf1hir89rfakdj19',  'DB_PREFIX' => 'wechat_',  'DB_BACKUP' => '../Data/backup',  'RBAC_ROLE_TABLE' => 'wechat_role',  'RBAC_USER_TABLE' => 'wechat_users',  'RBAC_ACCESS_TABLE' => 'wechat_access',  'RBAC_NODE_TABLE' => 'wechat_node',  'URL_CASE_INSENSITIVE' => true,  'SITE_NAME' => '361°商品管理数据库系统',  'SITE_TITLE' => NULL,  'SITE_KEYWORDS' => NULL,  'SITE_DESCRIPTION' => NULL,  'URL_MODEL' => 0,  'DEFAULT_THEME' => NULL,  'WX_QRCODE' => NULL,  'SITE_CDN' => 'http://361img.361sport.com.cn',);?>   漏洞证明：  地址 http://361shop.361sport.com.cn/.svn/entries
